compliant.section: You understand that the technical processing and transmission of the Website, including your Content, may involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing principles of integrity and confidentiality, and requirement for appropriate security of personal data.

compliant.section: In consideration of your access to this Website, you represent that you are of legal age to form a binding contract and are not a person barred from accessing the Website under the laws of any applicable jurisdiction.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing requiring consent, conditions for consent, and conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services.

compliant.section: Faraday's web server automatically records certain information incidental to your use of the Website.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization: Processing of personal data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary.

compliant.section: (a) provide true, accurate, current and complete Registration Data and (b) maintain and promptly update the Registration Data to keep it true, accurate, current and complete.
compliant.legal provisions: Accuracy (Article 5), Right to rectification (Article 16): Data subjects have the right to have inaccurate personal data rectified.

compliant.section: Faraday reserves the right to provide Registration Data to our officers, employees, contractors, agents, and designees to the extent necessary to enable them to execute certain web services for Faraday.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing agreements are required with all processors, ensuring they only process data on documented instructions and provide sufficient guarantees of GDPR compliance.

compliant.section: Faraday also reserve the right to disclose such information to any third party if Faraday is required to do so for any or all of the following: (i) by law; (ii) to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (iii) to protect the rights, property, or safety of Faraday.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is lawful if necessary for compliance with a legal obligation or for the purposes of legitimate interests pursued by the controller or a third party, except where such interests are overridden by interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

compliant.section: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password and account and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account.
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with the principle of accountability, requiring data controllers to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure and be able to demonstrate compliance with GDPR principles.

compliant.section: You agree to (a) immediately notify Faraday of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security
compliant.legal provisions: This refers to the obligation of data breach notification to the supervisory authority and potentially to data subjects without undue delay after becoming aware of a personal data breach.

compliant.section: You agree not to use the Website to: transmit or otherwise make available any information, data, text, software, messages, or other materials ("Content") that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libellous, invasive of another's right or otherwise objectionable; impersonate any person or entity, including, but not limited to, a Faraday official, forum leader, guide or host, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity; forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifiers in order to disguise the origin of any Content transmitted through the Website; transmit or otherwise make available any Content that you do not have a right to make available under any law or under contractual or fiduciary relationships (such as inside information, proprietary and confidential information learned or disclosed as part of employment relationships or under nondisclosure agreements); transmit or otherwise make available any Content that infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights ("Rights") of any party; transmit, or otherwise make available any material that contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment; interfere with or disrupt the Website or servers or networks connected to the Website, or disobey any requirements, procedures, policies or regulations of networks connected to the Website; and intentionally or unintentionally violate any applicable local, state, national or international law.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data such as lawfulness, fairness and transparency, purpose limitation, data minimisation, accuracy, storage limitations, integrity and confidentiality.

compliant.section: This Cookie Policy informs you about our practices regarding the collection of information through cookies and other tracking technologies.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information to be provided

compliant.section: Enabling basic functions of the website such as page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.
The Cookie Policy was updated on September 10, 2018.
compliant.legal provisions: Providing information about processing in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.

compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (a) your Contributions do not contain confidential or proprietary information;

By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (c) Faraday shall be entitled to use or disclose (or choose not to use or disclose) such Contributions for any purpose, in any way, in any media worldwide;
You may terminate your account with Faraday and any access to the Website by submitting such termination request to Faraday.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') and Right to data portability

compliant.section: non-transferable and non-exclusive right and license
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: view, copy, print, and download the Content of the Website and the Software on a single computer
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

non_compliant.section: We use cookies to improve your user experience. You may see our Privacy Policy for more information. By continuing to use this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes by which he or she, by a statement or by a clear affirmative action, signifies agreement to the processing of personal data relating to him or her.
non_compliant.amend: The user should be able to refuse cookies or withdraw consent as easily as they gave it.  The website should clearly state what cookies are used for and obtain explicit consent before setting any non-essential cookies.  Consider providing a cookie management tool and granular consent options.

non_compliant.section: The T&Cs, as well as the information and material included in any page of the Website may be changed or updated without notice.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, transparency and modalities; Lawfulness of processing; General principles for processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that any changes to the T&Cs will be communicated to users in a timely manner, allowing them to review the changes and withdraw consent if necessary.

non_compliant.section: In addition, when using particular Faraday owned or operated services, you and Faraday shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services, which may be posted and modified from time to time.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, transparency and modalities; Lawfulness of processing; General principles for processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify that any changes to guidelines or rules for specific services will be communicated to users in advance, providing them with the opportunity to understand the changes and exercise their rights accordingly.

non_compliant.section: By downloading any information or material from this Website, you agree on the T&Cs. If you do not agree on them, you must immediately stop accessing any part of the Website and downloading any information or material from it.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  It must involve a clear affirmative action.
non_compliant.amend: The user must have the option to access the website and its materials without consenting to the T&Cs. Consent should be separate from other matters and not bundled.

non_compliant.section: You also understand and agree that the Website may include certain communications from Faraday, such as service announcements, administrative messages and the Faraday newsletters, and that these communications are considered part of Website and you will not be able to opt out of receiving them.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject has the right to object at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her for such marketing, which includes profiling to the extent that it is related to such direct marketing.
non_compliant.amend: Users must be given the option to opt-out of marketing communications, even if these communications are considered part of the website.

non_compliant.section: Unless explicitly stated otherwise, any new features that augment or enhance the current service on the Website, shall be subject to the T&Cs.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent should be distinguishable from other matters, in an intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.
non_compliant.amend: This section should be clear and separate from the T&Cs, and users should actively agree to the new features being subject to the existing T&Cs.

non_compliant.section: You understand and agree that the Website is provided "AS-IS" and that Faraday assumes no responsibility for the timeliness, deletion, mis-delivery or failure to store any communications.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data is processed.
non_compliant.amend: Faraday cannot completely waive responsibility for data loss, especially if it concerns personal data. They need to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure data security and limit their liability in case of unavoidable data loss.

non_compliant.section: You are responsible for obtaining access to the Website, and that access may involve third-party fees (such as Internet service provider or airtime charges). In addition, you must provide and are responsible for all equipment necessary to access the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: N/A
non_compliant.amend: While not a GDPR violation, this section is standard practice and doesn't require modification.

non_compliant.section: 2. ACCESS QUALIFICATION
non_compliant.legal provisions: Requirement for information to be provided in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.
non_compliant.amend: This section heading should be rephrased to be more user-friendly, for example, 'Who can use our website?'

non_compliant.section: In consideration of your access to this Website, you represent that you are of legal age to form a binding contract and are not a person barred from accessing the Website under the laws of any applicable jurisdiction.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: This statement should be accompanied by a clear and comprehensive privacy policy that outlines the types of personal data collected, the purpose and legal basis for processing, data retention periods, data subject rights, and other relevant information as required by Article 13.

non_compliant.section: There are certain services on the Website which you may wish to subscribe for that may require you to provide personally identifiable information, such as name, mailing address, email address and other contact information as prompted by the registration form (the "Registration Data").
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency (Article 5), Lawfulness of processing (Article 6): Processing of personal data requires a lawful basis (e.g., consent, contract, legal obligation). The policy doesn't specify the legal basis for collecting this data.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for collecting and processing personal data, such as consent, contract performance, legal obligation, or legitimate interests. Clearly state the specific purpose for collecting each category of personal data.

non_compliant.section: If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, or Faraday has reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, Faraday has the right to suspend or terminate your account and refuse any and all current or future use of the Website (or any portion thereof).
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data must be accurate and kept up to date
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to specify that users have the right to rectify inaccurate data, as per GDPR Article 16.

non_compliant.section: You understand that through your use of the Website you consent to the collection and use of Registration Data, including the transfer of this information to the United States and/or other countries for storage, processing and use by Faraday and its affiliates for the purpose of verifying your identity in order to determine if you are Faraday’s intended customers.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: Consent should be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous. The policy should clarify the legal basis for processing (e.g., contract, legitimate interest) and provide options for withdrawing consent. Additionally, transfers of data outside the EU require appropriate safeguards, such as standard contractual clauses or adequacy decisions, which should be mentioned.

non_compliant.section: You may request Faraday to stop storing, processing and using your Registration Data anytime by writing to Faraday's registered address.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to request erasure, rectification, restriction of processing, and data portability through accessible means, which may include electronic means, considering the technology used for processing. Simply writing to a registered address may not be considered sufficiently accessible in the digital age.
non_compliant.amend: Provide an easily accessible electronic method (e.g., email address, online form) for data subjects to exercise their rights under the GDPR, including the right to erasure, rectification, restriction of processing, and data portability.

non_compliant.section: Faraday reserves the right to such approval without offering any reason to you.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness, and transparency: Data processing must be lawful, fair, and transparent to the data subject. Withholding the reason for refusal might infringe on the transparency principle.
non_compliant.amend: Faraday will provide a clear and concise reason for any account application refusal, respecting the individual's rights under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: You agree to (b) ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this is good security practice, it doesn't directly relate to GDPR provisions. GDPR focuses on how organizations handle and protect personal data, not on individual user behavior.
non_compliant.amend: No amendment needed from a GDPR perspective. This can remain as a recommended security practice.

non_compliant.section: Faraday cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this Section.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Accountability principle: The controller shall be responsible for, and be able to demonstrate compliance with, the data protection principles.  This section limits Faraday's responsibility in case of data breaches or non-compliance, which contradicts the principle of accountability.
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to clarify Faraday's responsibilities regarding data protection and compliance with GDPR, even in case of users' failure to comply with the policy.

non_compliant.section: Understanding how visitors interact with the website by collecting information anonymously. For example, we use Google Analytics to compile reports and help us to optimize this site and advertising.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Definition of consent, freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes;  Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend:
It is unclear if consent is obtained for using Google Analytics. While the data is collected anonymously, Google Analytics still processes personal data. The policy should explicitly state: 
- Whether consent is obtained for analytics cookies.
- How consent is obtained (e.g., through a cookie banner).
- That users have the right to refuse cookies and how to do so.
- That using Google Analytics is to improve the website and for advertising purposes.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy should clearly outline the legal basis for data processing (e.g., consent, contract performance, legal obligation, legitimate interests). It should specify the purpose of data collection and processing. Users should be informed about their rights, including the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, and object to processing.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis and purpose for data processing related to export and import compliance.  Clearly inform users about their data rights in this context.

non_compliant.section: You represent and warrant that you: (a) are not a prohibited party identified on any government export exclusion lists (see http://www.bis.doc.gov/complianceandenforcement/liststocheck.htm) or a member of a government of any other export-prohibited countries as identified in applicable export and import laws and regulations; (b) will not transfer software, technology, and other technical data via the Website to export-prohibited parties or countries, or in such way in violation applicable export or import laws.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - requiring consent for processing special categories of personal data; Lawfulness of processing - processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation
non_compliant.amend: This section potentially processes special categories of personal data, such as political opinions or trade union membership, by making inferences about users based on their potential presence on export exclusion lists or association with certain governments.  The GDPR requires a specific legal basis for processing such data, and consent is unlikely to be freely given in this context. To amend, this section should be rephrased to focus on objective criteria related to export control compliance without implicating sensitive personal data.

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (b) Faraday is not under any obligation of confidentiality, express or implied, with respect to the Contributions;
non_compliant.legal provisions: Confidentiality, Security of Processing
non_compliant.amend: Faraday should implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of user contributions.

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (e) your Contributions automatically become the property of Faraday without any obligation of Faraday to you;
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"), Right to Data Portability
non_compliant.amend: Users should retain control over their data and have the right to request deletion or transfer of their contributions.

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (f) you are not entitled to any compensation or reimbursement of any kind from Faraday under any circumstances.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to Compensation and Liability
non_compliant.amend: Users may have the right to compensation for material or non-material damages resulting from GDPR violations.

non_compliant.section:
8. INDEMNITY
You agree to indemnify and hold Faraday and its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, employees, partners and licensors harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of Content you submit, post, transmit, modify or otherwise make available through the Website, your use of the Website, your connection to the Website, your violation of the T&Cs, or your violation of any rights of another.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Data subjects' rights to compensation and liability, Right to an effective judicial remedy
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to clarify that Faraday's liability in the case of data breaches or other GDPR violations is not limited by this indemnity clause. Data subjects have the right to seek compensation from Faraday directly, and this right cannot be waived.

non_compliant.section:
9. MODIFICATIONS TO WEBSITE
Faraday reserves the right at any time and from time to time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Website (or any part thereof) with or without notice.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Transparency obligations, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While Faraday can modify its website, it needs to specify how it will inform users about changes to the privacy policy, especially if these changes affect the processing of their data. The company should be more specific about the possibility of modifications and how users will be notified, particularly if the changes involve increased processing or data sharing.

non_compliant.section: You agree that Faraday shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Website (or any part thereof).
non_compliant.legal provisions: N/A
non_compliant.amend: While this statement is not non-compliant, it's important to ensure that any modifications, suspensions, or discontinuations respect user rights under GDPR, such as data access and portability.

non_compliant.section: You agree that Faraday may, without prior notice, immediately terminate, limit your access to or suspend your Faraday account, any associated email address, and access to the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, Right of access, and Right to rectification
non_compliant.amend: GDPR requires that users are informed about the processing of their data (Article 12), have access to their data (Article 13), and can request rectification of inaccurate data (Article 14).  Therefore, Faraday should inform users about the reasons for termination, limitation of access, or suspension and provide them with an opportunity to rectify any issues or access their data.

non_compliant.section: Cause for such termination, limitation of access or suspension shall include, but not be limited to, (a) breaches or violations of the T&Cs or other incorporated agreements or guidelines, (b)requests by law enforcement or other government agencies, (c) discontinuance or material modification to the Website (or any part thereof), (d) unexpected technical or security issues or problems, (e) extended periods of inactivity, (f) engagement by you in fraudulent or illegal activities, and/or (g) nonpayment of any fees owed by you in connection with the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing and Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: While some of these reasons for termination are acceptable under GDPR (e.g., breaches of T&Cs, requests by law enforcement), others require careful consideration. For instance, terminating an account solely due to 'extended periods of inactivity' might not be justifiable unless Faraday can demonstrate a legitimate interest (Article 6) and has informed users about this possibility. Additionally, Faraday should clearly define what constitutes 'fraudulent or illegal activities' and ensure that any actions taken are proportionate and respect the user's rights.

non_compliant.section: Further, you agree that all terminations, limitations of access and suspensions for cause shall be made in Faraday's sole discretion and that Faraday shall not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your account, any associated email address, or access to the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to object; Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
non_compliant.amend: This section needs to be amended to clarify that users have the right to object to the processing of their data and to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if they believe their data protection rights have been violated.

non_compliant.section: The Website may provide, or third parties may provide, links to other World Wide Web sites or resources. It will disconnect you from Faraday's site. The linked sites are not under the supervisions of Faraday and thus, You acknowledge and agree that Faraday is not responsible for the availability of such external sites or resources.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to provide users with clear and concise information about the use of third-party links on the website. This includes informing users that clicking on these links may result in their data being processed by third parties and that Faraday is not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party websites. The section should also advise users to review the privacy policies of these third-party websites.

non_compliant.section: Faraday is providing these links to you as a convenience, it dose not endorse Faraday to the available linked sites. You further acknowledge and agree that Faraday shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such Content, goods or services available on or through any such site or resource.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency principle, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly inform users about the use of links on the website and their implications in a transparent manner. It should specify that Faraday is not responsible for the content or data processing practices of third-party websites linked on their platform. Additionally, the section should inform users about their rights related to their data when accessing these third-party links.

non_compliant.section:
12. FARADAY'S PROPRIETARY RIGHTS
You acknowledge and agree that the Website and any necessary software used in connection with the Website ("Software") contain proprietary and confidential information that is protected by applicable intellectual property and other laws.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: While this section addresses Faraday's proprietary rights, it lacks information about the user's rights regarding their personal data. To comply with GDPR, this section should include information about data subject rights such as access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, and data portability, along with the process for exercising these rights.

non_compliant.section: You further acknowledge and agree that Content contained in information presented to you through the Website IS protected by copyrights, trademarks, service marks, patents or other proprietary rights and laws.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The provided text pertains to intellectual property rights and does not fall under the scope of GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: No amendment needed for GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: Except as expressly permitted by applicable law or as authorised by Faraday or the applicable licensor, you agree not to modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute, transmit, broadcast, publicly perform or create derivative works based on the Website, such Content or the Software, in whole or in part.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The provided text pertains to intellectual property rights and does not fall under the scope of GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: No amendment needed for GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: You agree not to modify the Software in any manner or form, nor to use modified versions of the Software, including (without limitation) for the purpose of obtaining unauthorized access to the Website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: N/A
non_compliant.amend: This section is not directly related to data protection and GDPR compliance. However, it is important to ensure that any restrictions on software use are reasonable and do not infringe on users' rights.

non_compliant.section: You agree not to access the Website by any means other than through the interface that is provided by Faraday for use in accessing the Website, and will not be copied or posted on any network computer or broadcast in any media. You also agree that Faraday copyright notice must appear in all copies made, and the Content of the Website unchanged.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend:
This section restricts users' rights to access and use the website content, which may contradict the GDPR's principles of data access and portability. Users have the right to access and use their data in ways they see fit, as long as it doesn't infringe on copyright law.  

To amend this, rephrase the section to clarify that users can access and download their data, but Faraday retains copyright over the website and its underlying software. For example:

"You agree to access the Website only through the interface provided by Faraday. You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, or publicly display the Website or its content, except for downloading and making reasonable copies of your own data, subject to applicable copyright laws. All copies must retain Faraday's copyright notice and any other proprietary notices."

non_compliant.section: YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitations, Data protection by design and by default
non_compliant.amend:
Disclaiming liability with "as is" and "as available" clauses doesn't absolve Faraday from its GDPR obligations, particularly regarding data security (Article 5(1)(e)) and data protection by design and default (Article 25). 

To amend this, Faraday should implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including safeguards against accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure of, or access to personal data. The "as is" and "as available" disclaimer should not contradict these obligations.

non_compliant.section: FARADAY AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF TITLE, MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Right to an effective remedy, Right to compensation for damages
non_compliant.amend: Under the GDPR, data subjects have the right to an effective remedy and compensation for damages resulting from unlawful processing of their personal data. Disclaiming all warranties, including implied warranties, may infringe on these rights. To comply with the GDPR, Faraday should consider limiting the scope of the disclaimer to the extent permissible by law and provide clear information about the available remedies in case of data breaches or other data protection violations.

non_compliant.section: FARADAY AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT (i) THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS; (ii) THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE OR ERROR-FREE; (iii) THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE WILL BE ACCURATE OR RELIABLE; (iv) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION OR OTHER MATERIAL PURCHASED OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS; (v) THE WEBSITE AND THE SOFTWARE ARE FREE FROM ANY TECHNICAL INACCURACY OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS; AND (vi) ANY ERRORS IN THE SOFTWARE WILL BE CORRECTED.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Principles of data processing, Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: While absolute guarantees are not required, the GDPR mandates that data processing activities adhere to the principles of lawfulness, fairness, transparency, purpose limitation, data minimization, accuracy, storage limitation, integrity and confidentiality. Additionally, Article 32 requires organizations to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk. Completely disclaiming any warranty regarding the security, accuracy, and reliability of the website and software may contradict these obligations. Faraday should strive to implement appropriate security measures and provide reasonable assurances regarding the reliability and accuracy of its data processing activities, taking into account the state of the art and the cost of implementation.

non_compliant.section: ANY MATERIAL DOWNLOADED OR OTHERWISE OBTAINED THROUGH THE USE OF THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE IS ACCESSED AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK, AND YOU WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR AND HEREBY WAIVE ANY AND ALL CLAIMS AND CAUSES OF ACTION WITH RESPECT TO ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER SYSTEM, INTERNET ACCESS, DOWNLOAD OR DISPLAY DEVICE, OR LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM THE DOWNLOAD OF ANY SUCH MATERIAL.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Lawfulness of processing, Conditions for consent, Right to damages, Responsibility of the controller, General principles for transfers
non_compliant.amend: This section appears to waive all liability for damages related to data processing, which may infringe on the data subject's rights to legal remedies and the controller's responsibility for data protection.  The GDPR emphasizes a high level of protection for personal data, and blanket waivers of liability are unlikely to be enforceable.

non_compliant.section: NO ADVICE OR INFORMATION, WHETHER ORAL OR WRITTEN, OBTAINED BY YOU FROM FARADAY OR THROUGH OR FROM THE WEBSITE OR SOFTWARE SHALL CREATE ANY WARRANTY NOT EXPRESSLY STATED IN THE T&Cs.
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the data subject's rights, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While this section focuses on warranties outside the T&Cs, it might indirectly impact the clarity and transparency of information related to data processing. The GDPR emphasizes providing clear and concise information to data subjects about their rights and how their data is processed. This section could be interpreted as limiting those rights.

non_compliant.section: YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT FARADAY AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU, TO ONLY THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER THE APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ANY DAMAGE, SUCH AS DIRECT, PUNITIVE, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA
